org.apache.flink.runtime.client

类 JobClientActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.akka.FlinkUntypedActor
        • org.apache.flink.runtime.client.JobClientActor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    akka.actor.Actor, LeaderRetrievalListener
    直接已知子类:
    JobAttachmentClientActor, JobSubmissionClientActor

    public abstract class JobClientActor
extends FlinkUntypedActor
implements LeaderRetrievalListener
    Actor which constitutes the bridge between the non-actor code and the JobManager. This base class handles the connection to the JobManager and notifies in case of timeouts. It also receives and prints job updates until job completion.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 akka.actor.Actor

        akka.actor.Actor.emptyBehavior$, akka.actor.Actor.ignoringBehavior$

        从接口复制的说明: LeaderRetrievalListener

        指定者:
        notifyLeaderAddress 在接口中 LeaderRetrievalListener
        参数:
        leaderAddress - The address of the new leader
        leaderSessionID - The new leader session ID

      • handleError

        public void handleError(java.lang.Exception exception)
        从接口复制的说明: LeaderRetrievalListener
        This method is called by the LeaderRetrievalService in case of an exception. This assures that the LeaderRetrievalListener is aware of any problems occurring in the LeaderRetrievalService thread.
        指定者:
        handleError 在接口中 LeaderRetrievalListener
